00027 typedef struct fpt_step_
00028 {
00029   bool stable;                            
00032   int Ns;

00041 typedef struct fpt_data_
00042 {
00043   fpt_step **steps;                       
00044   int k_start;

00046   double *betaN;                          
00047   double *gammaN;                         
00048   double alpha_0;                         
00049   double beta_0;                          
00050   double gamma_m1;                        
00051   /* Data for direct transform. */        
00052   double *alpha;                          
00053   double *beta;                           
00054   double *gamma;                          
00055 } fpt_data;
